name: Accurate
description: Models with Accurate or models shooting with Accurate weapons ignore the penalty for shooting at Long range.

name: All-terrain(X)
description: All-terrain Vehicles gain a +X modifier on Dangerous terrain tests.

name: Anti-tank
description: Models with Anti-tank or models shooting with Anti-tank weapons targeting non-Vehicle units suffer an additional -1 Penalty to hit.

name: Commanding Presence(X)
description: Friendly units within 12" gains +X to its Discipline

name: Crushing Strength(X)
description: Model gains +X to wound modifier when attacking in Melee combat.

name: Cumbersome
description: Model considers all Rough terrain as Impassible terrain for movement purposes and during a Run move may only move up to (instead of double) its Move stat.

name: Explosive Charge(X)
description: Model may once per game gain +X to wound for one Melee attack against a Vehicle (this modifier is non-cumulative).

name: Fall-off
description: Weapons with Fall-off suffer a -1 Penetration penalty when shooting at Long Range

name: Fixed
description: Model may only target units at least partially in the models Front Arc and draw Line of Sight from the center of its Front facing when shooting. Model with Fixed may only pivot during an Advance move.

name: Flamethrower
description: Flamethrower weapons always

name: Gun Shield
description: Model gains Soft cover from enemy models shooting at it in its Front Arc.

name: Howitzer(X)
description: May choose to shoot as if it had Indirect(X).

name: Impact(X)
description: Model gains +X to wound modifier the first round of Melee combat if it charged.

name: Indirect(X)
description: May draw Line of Sight through friendly units when shooting (must still be able to see the target). May not target enemy units fully within X".

name: Limited(X)
description: Only X number of this unit may be taken in an army.

name: Melee Specialist
description: Model causes 2 hits instead of 1 when attacking in Melee combat.

name: Move or Fire
description: Models with or models shooting with Move or Fire weapons may only shoot during a Fire order.

name: Quick to Fire
description: Models with Quick to Fire or models shooting with Quick to Fire weapons do not suffer the penalty for Moving and Shooting.

name: Reload
description: Models with or models using Reload weapons may not shoot during Fire orders that are issued as a Reaction.

name: Scoring
description: Scoring units can take and count towards Objectives.

name: Sniper
description: Models with or models shooting with Sniper weapons ignore all to hit penalties except for Pins on Shooter and Wounded (See Team(X) rule). Any casualties caused by Snipers are removed by the attacking player instead of the owner of the unit.

name: Spotter
description: Units with Spotter gain an additional 25mm model with no weapons. This model does not need to maintain Unit Cohesion and is treated as a separate unit for enemy targeting and taking casualties. Spotters are never directly issued Orders, does not resolve or benefit from Orders issued to its 'parent' and may not react if it is targeted. Spotters may move up to its Move directly after its 'parent' unit has finished resolving a direct (i.e. not reactionary) Order. The Spotter is immediately removed if the 'parent' unit is destroyed. Spotters have Hard Target(2).

name: Tall
description: Models targeting Tall units with shooting may ignore intervening non-Tall enemy units for determining cover.

name: Team(X)
description: When removing a Team model as casualty it is not removed but instead mark it with a Wound token. Place one Wound token per casualty taken. When the number of Wound tokens equals X the model is immediately removed. Team models with only one Wound away from being removed suffer a -1 Penalty to hit.

name: Unwieldy
description: Models with Unwieldy o models shooting with Unwieldy weapon suffer an additional -1 for Moving and Shooting.
